settings.defaultTerminalProfileDescription: Select the default terminal Parrot will use. 'Default' uses your VSCode global setting.
settings.shellIntegrationTimeoutDescription: Set how long Parrot will wait for shell integration to activate before executing a command. Increase if experiencing terminal connection timeouts.
settings.aggressiveTerminalReuseDescription: When enabled, Parrot will reuse existing terminal windows not in the current working directory. Disable if experiencing task lockups after terminal commands.
settings.terminalExecutionModeDescription: Choose whether Parrot runs commands in VS Code terminals or background processes.
